title: To Do - A Task Management and Tracking Web App
description: To-Do is an open source task management and tracking web application designed to stramline task management in a simple an intitive way.
introduction:
Originally designed by another team called Groviero (their version has since been taken off github) myself and four other developers forked the open source project and continued it development over the course of four months as a term long project in our capstone software design course. 

We expanded drastically on the original open source design, implemented many new features and improved accessability.
content1: To-Do boasts features that allow the user to do the following: ,Add Tasks,Edit Exisitng Tasks,Delete Tasks,Set dates for tasks,Sort & Filter Tasks,View Tasks in various different formats
imgAlt2: The TO-Do app's task management page.
imgAlt3: The TO-Do app's calendar view for tasks.
imgAlt4: The TO-Do app's board view for tasks.

title: Bygone Eras - A History of our Planet
description: A Site cataloging some interesting and noteworthy events in earths history from our molten rock beggingings up to preset day
introduction: The History of our planet and all that came before us is a facinating topic. From the first signs of life, to the famous T-Rex, to you and me. Take a look back in time at some of the most interesting events that have taken place on our planet during it 4.5 billion year lifespan.
imgAlt1: Sneak peak at the content of the Bygone Eras homepage.

title: Rag Roll - A 3D platformer game
description: A small indie game based around the idea of platfoming and exploiting funky ragdoll physics
introduction: RagRoll is a level based platforming game where you play as a chibi character with an enormous head. You can move around levels traditionally by running and jumping OR roll around using your big head as a ball.
content1:
Exploit the funky physics and wonky level designs to complete each stage.
Do your best to make it to the end and see if you can beat your speed records.
